review: I can't explain how easy this was to set up. I bought one...set it up at work to try it out...and when I left and took it home, coworkers were sad to see it go since it was easy for all of us in the office to control.Once I used it at home, and given the price, this is really made for each TV you have in your house. So get 3 if you have that many TV's.Cons: Some of my favorite apps do not support it YET! But I know that will come if they want us customers to keep using their service(I'm looking at you Hulu). Also having to plug a power source into this device just makes the unit less pleasing to the eye...but what can you do?
